thread.title: DRAKE/RICKEY LYNN
thread.title_full: ASAP Tickets 7000+ reviewed by DRAKE/RICKEY LYNN

author: DRAKE/RICKEY LYNN
title: DRAKE/RICKEY LYNN
text:
best prices and good people, there company very honest another told me I would to pay for a visa to Bucharest Romania. Although ASAP ticket agent told that was not true . I traveled to Bucharest for dental work, because the dental work here is better than got in the USA. The prices are great around 374.00 for implant, less than 200.00 for root canals at DentArt great dentist. I rent apartment for month in Bucharest, the people are friendly, 25% speak English. I am in great location money exchange across the street, 50 feet from wonderful grocery store, and 4.2 KM to the Dentist. The dollar is strong here ! USD to LIE is 23 cent. 0% on money exchange. I have fresh Octopus form the grocery store. could not be happier I came to Bucharest. I rent from Ramona & Giuseppe, the have wonderful apartment in the city center, I wish every was as close for me to shop as it is here in Bucharest.
Leave a comment if you wish to rent a place here and I tell you how to rent from this great. My luggage was lost for 3 days, they went over and beyond to get the luggage delivered to my apartment. 5 stars to Ramona % Giuseppe, % stars to ASAP tickets that were the cheapest tickets and they flew on British Airways!
